Tampa.House at 36 Columbia Drive: The House at 36 Columbia Drive is a historic home in Tampa, Florida at 36 Columbia Drive on Davis Islands. It was built by Herbert Draper, a successful realtor during the Florida land boom, in 1926, and is an L-shaped hacienda with a three-story open campanile and transom windows. On August 3, 1989, it was added to the U.S. National Register of Historic Places.
